question: وَإِثْمُهُمَا
answer: But sin of both of them

question: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ
answer: And surely We will test you

question: لِيُحَاجُّوكُمْ
answer: so that they argue with you

question: فَأَخْرَجَهُمَا
answer: and he got [both of] them out

question: لَذَهَبَ
answer: He would certainly have taken away

question: وَأُشْرِبُوا
answer: And they were made to drink

question: فَلْيَصُمْهُ
answer: then he should fast in it

question: وَالْمُطَلَّقَاتُ
answer: And the women who are divorced

question: فَعِدَّةٌ
answer: then prescribed number (should be made up)

question: وَالْعَاكِفِينَ
answer: and those who seclude themselves for devotion and prayer

question: يُعَمَّرُ
answer: he could be granted a life

question: لَأَعْنَتَكُمْ
answer: surely He (could have) put you in difficulties

question: الْقَيُّومُ
answer: the Sustainer of all that exists

question: فَسَيَكْفِيكَهُمُ
answer: So will suffice you against them

question: يُمِيتُكُمْ
answer: He will cause you to die

question: فَأَمَاتَهُ
answer: Then he was made to die

question: لَمُهْتَدُونَ
answer: (will) surely be those who are guided

question: وَلَتَجِدَنَّهُمْ
answer: And surely you will find them

question: فَلَنُوَلِّيَنَّكَ
answer: So We will surely turn you
